title: Light Tetra Dualies
paragraphs: The Light Tetra Dualies are a main weapon in Splatoon 2 and Splatoon 3. They are a variant of the Dark Tetra Dualies with a different look and loadout.

The Light Tetra Dualies are similar in appearance to the Dark Tetra Dualies. However, the black part of the Light Tetra Dualies is white, and the front part has scarlet-colored highlights instead of purple and green.
The Light Tetra Dualies were released on 1 August 2018 at 00:00 UTC.[1] It comes with Sprinkler and Autobomb Launcher.
- An Inkling (frontmost) wielding the Light Tetra Dualies.
The Light Tetra Dualies return in Splatoon 3 as part of the Sizzle Season 2023. Its kit consists of Sprinkler and Zipcaster.
- The top right card is for the Light Tetra Dualies
- The Tableturf Battle card icon of the Light Tetra Dualies.
